project.description: Given a list of space delimited keys ($DIRS), this job will get all values from $OLDKV and sets them in this cluster.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DIRS
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Space delimited list of keys. Default keys are for mantra migrations.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
eval ${SETUPKEYS}
for key in $DIRS; do echo ${key} for i in `etcdctl --peers ${OLDKV} --no-sync ls ${key}`; do OLDVAL=$(eval "${SSHCMD} 'etcdctl --peers ${OLDKV} --no-sync get ${i}'") eval "${SSHCMD} 'etcdctl set ${key} '${OLDVAL}''" done done
